name: LabirinTinta
description:
Help the paint bucket using your paint to move around in the invisible maze.

Controls

  • Move - W A S D
  • Shoot - Mouse Click Left
  • Jump - Space
  • Run - Shift
  • Exit Game - Escape

Gameplay

Use your paint to color the invisible maze. Find the way out. watch out for hazards.

Team
